title: You 2.0: Loss And Renewal
description: Maya Shankar was well on her way to a career as a violinist when an injury closed that door. This week, as part of our annual You 2.0 series on personal growth and reinvention, we revisit our 2015 conversation with Maya, in which she shares how she found a new path forward after losing an identity she loved.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: Maya Shankar was well on her way to a career as a violinist when an injury closed that door.
